markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Jade Cat](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2982)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 265 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 6 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You fall or attempt an Acrobatics check to Balance

**Requirement** You are trained in Acrobatics
</row>

</column>

---

A thumb-sized feline carved of rare stone, the _jade cat_ is typically worn as a pendant upon a suit of armor. For 1 minute after you activate the cat, you treat all falls as 20 feet shorter, you are not off-guard when you [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28), and narrow surfaces and uneven ground are not difficult terrain for you.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Jade Cat
